animeTitle: Become the Castellan in Another World
otherNames: 从今天开始当城主, Cong Jin Tian Kai Shi Dang Cheng Zhu, Starting from Today I'll Work as a City Lord
synopsis: When a gamer and homebody starts the buff for traveling through time and space, he certainly chooses to make waves! Make waves! And make waves! Domineering cat lady, Lori fox lady, Girly rabbit lady…This is not a Zoo! This is a fantastic Another World under the rule of the law of the jungle! In a real strategic game and a huge conspiracy crisis, the Overlord of Another World is emerging, with the rest nothing but losers…
